snippet: The action seeks to recover losses the rate manipulation caused to 10 banks that failed and were taken over by the agency.
abstract: Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation sues 16 big banks that set crucial global interest rate, accusing them of fraud and conspiring to keep rate low to enrich themselves; banks are accused of rigging London interbank offered rate, known as Libor; action seeks to recover losses rate manipulation caused to 10 banks that failed and were taken over by agency.
lead_paragraph: The action seeks to recover losses the rate manipulation caused to 10 banks that failed and were taken over by the agency.

headline.main: F.D.I.C. Sues 16 Big Banks Over Rigging of a Key Rate
headline.print_headline: F.D.I.C. Sues 16 Big Banks Over Rigging of a Key Rate
